PoliceCars.name: Police Pursuit
PoliceCars.description: This Police Pursuit toy car features realistic lights and sounds, making it perfect for thrilling police chase playtime adventures.

PoliceCars.name: Rescue Suv Patrol
PoliceCars.description: The Rescue Suv Patrol toy car is equipped with a working siren and a removable police figure, allowing kids to engage in exciting rescue missions.

SportsCars.name: Super Speedster
SportsCars.description: The Super Speedster toy car is designed for high-speed racing. Its sleek design and pull-back action provide thrilling racing adventures.

SportsCars.name: Racing Rocket
SportsCars.description: The Racing Rocket toy car features a turbo boost function and comes with racing decals, allowing kids to customize their racing experience.

Jeeps.name: Adventure Explorer
Jeeps.description: The Adventure Explorer toy jeep is perfect for off-road adventures. It comes with working suspension and rugged tires for tackling any terrain.

Jeeps.name: Off-Road Trekker
Jeeps.description: The Off-Road Trekker toy jeep is built for extreme off-roading. Its sturdy construction and all-terrain wheels ensure endless off-road fun.
